title: In These Two UP Crimes, A Curious Case Of Accused Switching Roles - NDTV
content: In These Two UP Crimes, A Curious Case Of Accused Switching Roles  NDTV
description: An abduction and its probe that unfolded a fraud - a curious case of accused and victim switching roles has unfolded over the past three days across Meerut and Noida, culminating in the arrest of both.
